Log in to Hulugram by QR Code 1 Open Telegram on your phone 2 Go to Settings > Devices > Link Desktop Device 3 Point your phone at this screen to confirm login Show Story Fonts Open photo Open chat Hide tabs Hide tabs in archive Hide Recent Chats This action will hide the recent user popup screen in user private chat, which is designed for quickly switching to another user. Messages will expand horizontally to cover the entire width of the screen, but this behavior will be limited to channels only. Touch on user photo All of your hidden chat will be shown here Remove From %s By placing this order you confirm that you read and agree toour terms and conditions. Choose an Icon Disable Filter Hide Message Edit Button Wide Post Message Button Type Share Hulugram Share **Hulugram** to your friends Recent Chats Tap on this to access mini apps LockChats UnLock Chats Translation Setting Bookmark Feed Hulugram needs access to your microphone so that you can record videos. Hulugram needs access to your camera so that you can scan QR codes. Profile Hide Phone Number Show ID and DC Telegram APl shows IDs as they are, while the Bot API adds a minus sign for groups and -100 for supergroups, broadcast groups and channels. Open Archive on Pull-down Disable \"Unarchive\" swipe Swiping to the left will not remove chats from the archive. When these options are enabled, data about the device is collected and sent to Google Analytics and Crashlytics, allowing us to keep usage statistics and track errors in the app. \n\nHowever, if the options are switched off, the data collection stops and the sent data is instantly deleted. Bottom Button Quick Admin Shortcuts Quick Chat Shortcuts Quick Drawer Shortcuts Hide Keyboard on Scroll Disable \"Jump to the Next Channel\" Show Timestamps for Actions Hide Side \"%1$s\" Button Message Menu Add Comma after Mention A comma will be placed automatically after tapping on the user you want to mention. Hide Photo Counter The annoying photo counter at the top of the screen will disappear from your view. Hide Instant Camera Tile The camera tile will be replaced by a floating button. Pressing the button will launch the Telegram camera, holding it down will launch the system camera. Static Zoom When recording video messages, the zoom will not reset if you release your fingers. Camera in Video Messages Rear Front Ask Rear Camera Front Camera Double Tap Skip Time Remember last used Camera When recording video messages, the last used camera will be selected. Auto-Pause Pauses a video playback when device is locked or Hulugram is minimized. Disable Playback Disables playback when volume button is pressed. Account Name Pencil Icon for Edited Messages Account Protection Protect your accounts with a unique passcode. Tap the lock icon above your chat list to access them. Enable Account Protection Choose an account to protect with a passcode. Please enter any 4 digits that you will use to unlock your Telegram account. Please enter the password you will use to unlock your Telegram account. Passcode already used. Please choose another one. Tap the lock icon above your chat list to access your hidden accounts. When an account is protected with a passcode, it will be hidden from the side menu. Disable Account Protection Are you sure you want to disable the account protection feature? Something went wrong Hulugram has stopped working. Please, send logs to the developers so that they can fix this bug as soon as possible. More Deliverable Empty Collections Wallet Scan QR Code QR Code No wallet address found in the selected image. No wallet address found Gram Wallet Create My Wallet Import existing wallet Congratulations Your Gram wallet has just been created. Only you control it.\n\nTo be able to always have access to it, please write down secret words and set up a secure passcode. Continue CLOSE 24 Secret Words Secret Words Write down these 24 words in the correct order and store them in a secret place.\n\nUse these secret words to restore access to your wallet if you lose your passcode or device. Done Sure done? You didnâ€™t have enough time to write these words down. OK, SORRY Test Time! Now letâ€™s check that you wrote your secret words correctly.\n\nPlease enter the words **%d**, **%d** and **%d** below: Incorrect words The secret words you have entered do not match the ones in the list. See words Try again Ready to go! You are all set. Now you have a wallet that only you control â€” directly, without middlemen or bankers. View My Wallet You can restore access to your wallet by entering the 24 words you wrote down when creating the wallet. I donâ€™t have them Incorrect words Sorry, you have entered incorrect secret words. Please double check and try again. Too Bad! Without the secret words you canâ€™t restore access to the wallet. Enter 24 secret words Create a new empty wallet instead Perfect! Now set up a passcode to secure your transactions. Set a Passcode Set a Passcode Repeat the Passcode Passcode options Enter code Choose code type 4-Digit code 6-Digit code Custom numeric code Passcodes do not match Minimum passcode length is 4 Done! %1$s Grams have been sent to Your balance Your test balance %1$s * locked Receive Send Deposit Wallet Created Your wallet address from: to: Your Wallet Address Copy wallet address Create invoice Share Wallet Address updated a few seconds ago updated %1$s ago Swipe down to refresh Release to refresh updating updating %d%% Send Grams Recipient Receiver Copy the 48-letter wallet address of the recipient here or ask them to send you a ton:// link. You don\'t have enough grams. Sending money from a wallet to the same wallet is not allowed Proceed This link can be used to send money on the TON Blockchain. To do this, you need to set up a Gram wallet first. The Gram Wallet has switched from the testing to the main network.\n\nIn case you want to perform more testing you can switch back to the Test Gram network in Settings and reconnect your wallet using 24 secret words. Create Wallet Pending Date Blockchain fee: ~%1$s Grams Please wait until the wallet is loaded! Please wait until the transaction is confirmed! Blockchain ID Config source Using a different configuration allows you to change Lite Server addresses. Url Json Config json Config url Enter config json Enter config url Enter blockchain ID This setting is for developers. Change it only if you are working on creating your own TON network. Are you sure you want to change the blockchain ID? You don\'t need this unless you\'re testing your own TON network.\n\nIf you proceed, you will need to reconnect your wallet using 24 secret words. Error App was unable to load blockchain config from the given url. Please make sure that url is corrent and you have an active Internet connection. Sorry, this config is invalid. App was unable to load blockchain config. Please make sure that you have an active Internet connection. Please wait while the wallet finishes syncing with the TON Blockchain. The gram wallet allows you to make fast and secure blockchain-based payments without intermediaries. This will disconnect the wallet from this app. You will be able to restore your wallet using 24 secret words â€“ or import another wallet.\n\nGram Wallets are located in the decentralized TON Blockchain. If you want a wallet to be deleted, simply transfer all the grams from it and leave it empty. Encrypted message Please confirm your credentials to decrypt transactions messages. **Note:** Your comment \"%1$s\" will **not be encrypted**. Are you sure you want to switch to the Test Gram network? It exists only for testing purposes.\n\nIf you proceed, you will need to reconnect your wallet using 24 secret words. Are you sure you want to switch to the Main Gram network?\n\nIf you proceed, you will need to reconnect your wallet using 24 secret words.
